text: Reminder: What cool things have you been working on? show it off we love to see everyone’s cool and creative work. If it’s a site built on HubSpot consider also posting to the <https://designers.HubSpot.com/inspire|Inspire gallery>.

*New form builder for HubSpot (live on the App Marketplace!)*

Hi! We’re the makers of <https://www.fillout.com/integrations/HubSpot|fillout.com>, a new type of form builder for HubSpot.

What is Fillout?

Fillout connects directly to HubSpot when you first create a form, which makes the integration simpler and more native than other form tools. Out-of-the-box, Fillout can:

• Create and update contacts
• Make multi-page forms
• Connect a custom domain
• Track drop-off analytics
• Add 50+ customizable question types
• Enrich leads
• Advanced conditional logic
• View partial submissions
Check out the <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V6ZIKISqmHk&ab_channel=Fillout|demo here>. We have a generous free tier that allows for up to 1000 submissions per month.

Feel free to comment with any questions or feedback, I’ll be around!

Demo here if that's easier to see :slightly_smiling_face:

How to make a form with Fillout + HubSpot :point_down:
For anyone looking for a free AI-powered support disposition management tool for HubSpot Service Hub, check us out at <https://www.DrumCV.com>

Hi All,

Unique Coderz has launched a new module on the HubSpot marketplace that comes with two notable features: drag-and-drop functionality, which makes it easy to customize and design cards, and a repeater feature, which likely allows users to duplicate or replicate elements easily. If you want to explore this module further or consider using it, you can find more information and access it through the provided HubSpot marketplace link.

<https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/modules?eco_providers=Unique%20Coderz&eco_search=service-cards-uz-module-by-unique-coderz>
